price: ߞߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߊߢߊ߯ߡߌ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߝߎߦߊߝߎߦߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
